meanings.definition: The act of burying a dead body again in a different place.
meanings.sent1: The reinterment of the soldier's remains brought closure to the family.
meanings.sent2: After many years, the reinterment of the historical figure was necessary due to a new memorial.
meanings.sent3: The reinterment of the cat's toy under the couch was a mystery to the family.
meanings.sent4: The reinterment of old memories in her mind made her feel nostalgic.
meanings.sent5: The reinterment of the time capsule was a momentous occasion for the town.

meanings.definition: The process of moving a body from one grave to another.
meanings.sent1: The reinterment of the deceased was done with utmost respect by the cemetery staff.
meanings.sent2: Due to a cemetery expansion, the reinterment of several bodies was carefully carried out.
meanings.sent3: The reinterment of the lost sock from the laundry to the bedroom drawer was a relief.
meanings.sent4: The reinterment of the old building's foundation symbolized a fresh start for the community.
meanings.sent5: The reinterment of the fallen tree in the forest created a new habitat for wildlife.
